mapper.select: SELECT stuIndex, studentId, studentName, isMale, studyYear, studyGroup, carPlateNum FROM stuCarplate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stuCarplate (studentId, studentName, isMale, studyYear, studyGroup, carPlateNum) values (#{studentId}, #{studentName}, #{isMale}, #{studyYear}, #{studyGroup}, #{carPlateNum});
mapper.update: UPDATE stuCarplate SET studentId=#{studentId}, studentName=#{studentName}, isMale=#{isMale}, studyYear=#{studyYear}, studyGroup=#{studyGroup}, carPlateNum=#{carPlateNum} WHERE stuIndex = #{stuIndex};
